actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 232 of the Trade Expansion Act of 1962 in order to prohibit the imposition under the authority of that section of duties, taxes, or fees on the importation of petroleum and petroleum products, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Trade Expansion Act of 1962, the imposition under the authority of that Act of duties, taxes, or fees on the importation of petroleum and petroleum products.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 232 of the Trade Expansion Act of 1962 in order to prohibit the imposition under the authority of that section of duties, taxes, or fees on the importation of petroleum and petroleum products, and for other purposes.
